entry.title: Rangers v Celtic: Title race over with win as Neil Lennon makes Josip Juranovic transfer prediction

entry.title: Hibs-Celtic Reaction - O'Riley drought, return of lost Hibs hero and in praise of Ryan Porteous
entry.summary: Celtic maintained their nine-point lead at the top of the Premiership with a dominant 4-0 win over Hibs at Easter Road. Aaron Mooy scored a double, his first goals for the club. Daizen Maeda and Kyogo Furuhashi were also on the scoresheet. Both teams now face hugely significant derbies on Monday.
